summary: Defines a SpanDetail data model that aggregates all relevant fields of a tracing span—such as identifiers, timestamps, kind, status, attributes, events, and links—and offers methods to convert the instance into JSON‑compatible dictionaries or other standard representations.
business_intent: Facilitates the collection and export of detailed tracing information from the CLI client so that performance and execution data can be recorded, visualized, or sent to external observability platforms.
